stripped_text: Limit 1 remote server. As an additional cost to run HQ, the Runner must pay 1 credit. click: Flip this identity.
text: Limit 1 remote server. As an additional cost to run HQ, the Runner must pay 1[credit]. [click]: Flip this identity.
title: Earth Station: SEA Headquarters

faces.stripped_text: Limit 1 remote server. As an additional cost to run a remote server, the Runner must pay 6 credits. When the Runner makes a successful run on HQ, flip this identity.
faces.text:
Limit 1 remote server.
As an additional cost to run a remote server, the Runner must pay 6[credit].
When the Runner makes a successful run on HQ, flip this identity.
faces.title: Earth Station: Ascending to Orbit
